refnamediv.refpurpose: Generates a blend at an end (base [b] or top [t]) of the specified RCC shape.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Generates a blend at an end (base [b] or top [t]) of the specified RCC shape. The thickness is the radius of the TOR curvature. The blend is saved as a region made up of an RCC and a TOR. The default end is the base.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The two examples show the use of the rcc-blend command to generate a blend at the base and at the top of specified RCC shapes.

example.title: Generate a blend at the base of a specified RCC shape.
example.para: Creates a region named blend.s that extends 10 units from the base of rcc.s.

example.title: Generate a blend at the top of a specified RCC shape.
example.para: Creates a region named blend.s that extends 10 units from the top of rcc.s.
